DOC.brief_title: ABR-217620 Patients With Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer , Renal Clear Cell Carcinoma Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients histologically cytologically confirm nonsmall cell lung cancer , refractory ( progress follow ) currently available standard therapy . Patients must receive ( decline ) least one standard regimen advanced/metastatic disease . ECOG performance status 0 1 . Adequate bone marrow function define absolute neutrophil count great equal 1500/mm3 , platelet great equal 100,000/mm3 , hemoglobin great equal 10 g/dL . Adequate renal function : creatinine le equal 1.5 x upper limit normal . Adequate hepatic function : bilirubin le equal 2 x upper limit normal , SGOT ( SASAT ) SGPT ( SALAT ) less equal 2.5 x upper limit normal . Life expectancy great 3 month . Pregnant breastfeed woman , woman childbearing potential unless effective method contraception use . A serious uncontrolled medical disorder active infection would impair patient 's ability receive study treatment . History concurrent malignancy , exception follow malignancy , may still include : nonmelanoma skin cancer , cervical cancer situ , DCIS LCIS breast , past history resect melanoma without clinical evidence recurrent melanoma , past history prostate cancer without clinical evidence disease ( include patient receive hormonal therapy ) . History brain metastasis , unless stable 4 week , require steroid therapy without clinical symptom brain metastasis . Acute illness evidence infection , include unexplained fever ( temperature great 100.5 degree Fahrenheit 38.1 degree Celsius ) . Significant symptomatic cardiac disease include : history ( within past 6 month ) current unstable angina , congestive heart failure , myocardial infarction ; patient uncontrolled hypertension , hypertension control multiply drug ( control monotherapy permit ) . History current arrhythmia require treatment , exception nonspecific , asymptomatic STT wave change extrasystoles . History cerebrovascular accident within past 5 year . Seizure disorder require therapy . Treatment betablockers , include topical therapy glaucoma , 6day treatment period ( 5 day ' treatment + 1 day patient followup ) , within five day prior start treatment . Simultaneous participation study involve investigational drug participate study le 4 week prior start study treatment . Treatment systemic inhale corticosteroid within 2 week prior start treatment . Treatment anticoagulant , except use maintain patency central venous line . Active autoimmune disease require therapy history systemic lupus erythematosus rheumatoid arthritis . Chemo/radio/immunotherapy le 4 week ( 6 week mitomycin C nitrosoureas ) start treatment . Major surgery le 3 week . Known positive serology HIV ( patient know history HIV exclude potential unforeseen toxicity morbidity immunocompromised host ) . Known chronic Hepatitis B C. Previous exposure murine monoclonal antibody ( HAMA titer detection limit baseline ) know hypersensitivity murine protein . Patients currently renal dialysis treatment . Known allergy hypersensitivity aminoglycosides e.g . kanamycin .
